comments.body: Though it looks odd to add yourself to a cleanup PR. guess that's my review on the way getting kicked out  *smile*

I agree, except that I'm not actually adding myself. I'm removing myself from being added via an alias (as most of the other entries in the team / alias are already explicit).

I've been in `test/` approvers here via the sig-testing-approvers team / alias for O(years) and i'm quite active here.

The subtext is that I'd like to remove the concept of """sig-testing-approvers""" owning various directories instead of specific people, but to do that I needed to own it without the alias. I didn't quite finish that part, I'll get to it in a future cleanup.

IMHO it's a huge anti-pattern to opaquely grant people ownership of multiple directories via these aliases, and now that I chair SIG Testing I intend to have SIG Testing stop doing this. We don't have many people in the OWNERS_ALIASES entry anyhow.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@  - alejandrox1
  - andrewsykim
  - BenTheElder
  - bowei # for test/e2e/{dns*,network}.go
  - cblecker

comments.body:
LGTM!
thanks for all the help @andrewsykim

comments.body: Could you add john Schnake too as a reviewer here?
